conversations.content: Alice's mouse is broken. Could you rebuy the same mouse I purchased last time? Please apply my available discount and send the invoice to her email at alice.miller@gmail.com.

<|Function_Thought|>
To accomplish the user's task of re-buying the same mouse that Alice purchased last time, I need to first view the order history. This will allow me to identify the specific mouse that was purchased previously. Once I have that information, I can then check for any available discounts, add the product to the cart, proceed to checkout, retrieve the invoice, and send it to Alice's email. Therefore, I will first initiate the `view_order_history` function.
<|/Function_Thought|>
